---
title: "Linked D3 Scatter Plots"
output: html_document
---

This is a demonstration of the linked D3 scatterplot htmlwidget.

```{r}
library(linkedscatter)
library(ISLR)
data(Auto)

linkedscatter(Auto, y='mpg', x1='weight', x2='acceleration', tooltip='name')
```

```{r firstPlot}
boundAuto[["wt_mpg"]] <- linkedscatter(x='weight', y='mpg', tooltip='name')
boundAuto[["wt_mpg"]]
```

```{r secondPlot}
boundAuto[["acc_mpg"]] <- linkedscatter(x='acceleration', y='mpg', tooltip='name')
boundAuto[["acc_mpg"]]
```
